monsterAbilities.name: Archer
cards: *Create a 3 damage trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy

monsterAbilities.name: Deep Terror
cards: ^Summon normal Deep Terror in a hex adjacent to the target

monsterAbilities.name: Flame Demon
cards: *Create a 4 damage trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy

monsterAbilities.name: Giant Viper
cards: ^Add +2 Attack if the target is adjacent to any of the Giant Viper's allies.
^Add +2 Attack if the target is adjacent to any of the Giant Viper's allies.
^All attacks targeting Giant Viper this round gain Disadvantage.

monsterAbilities.name: Night Demon
cards: *All adjacent enemies and allies suffer 1 damage.

monsterAbilities.name: Ooze
cards: *Summons normal Ooze with a hit point value equal to the summoning Ooze's current hit point value (limited by a normal Ooze's specified maximum hit point value)
*Summons normal Ooze with a hit point value equal to the summoning Ooze's current hit point value (limited by a normal Ooze's specified maximum hit point value)

monsterAbilities.name: Savvas Lavaflow
cards: ^All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer 2 damage.
